summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5832 for the improvement of 20th Avenue West, from West Dravus Street to Gilman Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76896 as amended by Ordinance No. 77036, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
